text:
Allan Rich (born Benjamin Norman Schultz; February 8, 1926 – August 22, 2020) was an American character actor, author, acting coach and activist. He was born in New York City. He starred in "Serpico", "Disclosure" and "Quiz Show".
Rich was one of the many alleged communist sympathizers blacklisted in the 1950s Hollywood blacklist.
Rich died on August 22, 2020 in Englewood, New Jersey from dementia-related problems, aged 94.
